name: Voodoo (itch)
description:
Voodoo is an action adventure game, where you take revenge for your killed village . You posses the bodies of your dead  citizens and use them to help you proceed through the game.

While fighting evil demons you rely on the help of  spirits and voodoo gods (Loa).

Team: Natalia Scigulla, Adrian Splisteser, Nils Mahn, Paul Grimm
